about_the_game: This demo is a shortened version of the original, showcasing the features that you can expect to see to greater effect in the complete version

content_descriptors.notes: Customers should expect to see appearances or blood splatter still frames, as well as still frames of characters that appear with horror-themed deformed or mutated images. These images are meant to invoke thrill to the player as is expected of the theme of the game. It is very mild and potentially comical, and would not be seen as realistic by modern standards.

detailed_description: This demo is a shortened version of the original, showcasing the features that you can expect to see to greater effect in the complete version
name: Bookey Manor Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: This is a simple point-and-click, horror themed game, where you must click on the manor key to maintain your sanity and survive the scares of the residents and beings seen in the manor.
